verses.verse: A Psalm of David.<WH1732> Judge<WH8199> me, O LORD;<WH3068> for<WH3588> I<WH589> have walked<WH1980> in mine integrity:<WH8537> I have trusted<WH982> also in the LORD;<WH3068> therefore I shall not<WH3808> slide.<WH4571>
Examine <WH974> me, O LORD,<WH3068> and prove<WH5254> me; try<WH6884> my reins<WH3629> and my heart.<WH3820>
For <WH3588> thy lovingkindness<WH2617> is before<WH5048> mine eyes:<WH5869> and I have walked<WH1980> in thy truth.<WH571>
I have not<WH3808> sat<WH3427> with<WH5973> vain<WH7723> persons,<WH4962> neither<WH3808> will I go in<WH935> with<WH5973> dissemblers.<WH5956>
I have hated<WH8130> the congregation<WH6951> of evildoers;<WH7489> and will not<WH3808> sit<WH3427> with<WH5973> the wicked.<WH7563>
I will wash<WH7364> mine hands<WH3709> in innocency:<WH5356> so will I compass<WH5437> thine<WH853> altar,<WH4196> O LORD: <WH3068>
That I may publish<WH8085> with the voice<WH6963> of thanksgiving,<WH8426> and tell<WH5608> of all<WH3605> thy wondrous works.<WH6381>
LORD, <WH3068> I have loved<WH157> the habitation<WH4583> of thy house,<WH1004> and the place<WH4725> where thine honor<WH3519> dwelleth.<WH4908>
Gather <WH622> not<WH408> my soul<WH5315> with<WH5973> sinners,<WH2400> nor my life<WH2416> with<WH5973> bloody<WH1818> men: <WH376>
In whose<WH834> hands<WH3027> is mischief,<WH2154> and their right hand<WH3225> is full<WH4390> of bribes.<WH7810>
But as for me,<WH589> I will walk<WH1980> in mine integrity:<WH8537> redeem<WH6299> me, and be merciful<WH2603> unto me.
My foot<WH7272> standeth<WH5975> in an even place:<WH4334> in the congregations<WH4721> will I bless<WH1288> the LORD.<WH3068>
